title: "Melinda Gates says AI in pregnancy could help save women's lives"
excerpt: "Using artificial intelligence, or AI, to provide maternal health care to women, especially those in rural and low-income areas, could be a \"game-changer\" in saving the lives of pregnant women, Melinda Gates, chairperson of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, told ABC News chief medical correspondent Dr. Jennifer Ashton."
